question: Union Road Transport Minister inaugurated 16 National Highways projects worth over Rs 15000 crores in which state/UT?
explanation:
Union Minister for Road Transport and Highways Nitin Gadkari inaugurated and laid the foundation stones for 16 National Highways projects in Andhra Pradesh.
The projects have a total length of 1,411 km and the total outlay of the projects is Rs 15,592 crore. Andhra Pradesh has added 2,667 km of national highways in the last six years which stands for 64 per cent growth from May 2014.
